title: _SES_DOWNLOAD_MICROCODE_CONTROL_DIAGNOSTIC_PAGE (storport.h)
description: The _SES_DOWNLOAD_MICROCODE_CONTROL_DIAGNOSTIC_PAGE structure (storport.h) contains a vendor specific microcode image used by the enclosure services process.
